name: MixedInk
short_description:
MixedInk's platform allows massive groups to weave their ideas and opinions into
a single text.
long_description:
MixedInk's platform allows massive groups to weave their ideas and opinions into
a single text. It combines the wiki concept with a democratic rating system like
Digg's. Larry Lessig recently called it "compelling," and Craig Newmark said it
"could be a real step toward online democracy."
